title: János Erdei
text: János Erdei (2 November 1919 – 10 January 1997) was a Hungarian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Featherweight">men's featherweight</a> event at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
